title: 10-Minute Meditation For Anxiety
description:
Take a moment and let this guided meditation relieve your anxiety.

Written and Narrated by John Davisi. John is a mindfulness life coach, teacher, and speaker. Check out his mindfulness and meditation sessions at https://www.youtube.com/c/JohnDavisi .

Subscribe to John Davisi: https://www.youtube.com/c/JohnDavisi

Subscribe to Goodful: https://bzfd.it/2QApoPk

comments: I might be scared. I might be anxious. I might be panicked. But in all those situations, I know that I can remain calm. I can handle my emotions. I can remain strong. I can do it. I can get through. It will be okay in the end. I love myself, and hereby, I promise to try staying positive, even when my overthinking tries to pull me down. I will not let my anxiety take over me. I can take control of myself and I will. I will stay strong. I will not give up. Now, I let go of all my negative irrational feelings and fears. Goodbye.

Did anyone else feel like he just took a walk through your mind? Before this I was shaking from anxiety. I completely felt every word that he said, and could visualize my stress floating away! This is so powerful
if ur reading this, which is pretty rare, i want to let u know i’m proud of u and we will get through this together. ur so strong ❤️

Thinking about how many people return to this meditation everyday , like myself. there’s somebody else out there maybe down the street ,maybe thousands of miles away,experiencing what I am in this moment. If you’re reading this you aren’t alone.I know it’s easier said than done, read through these comments. Imagine all of us right next to you holding your hand and understanding exactly what you’re going through in this moment. we all made it another day and you’re going to too.
Everyone who sees this: You’re beautiful, and never give up your dreams, you are on this world for a reason!❤️
